name: Vegan Rajas con Crema Tacos
description: Vegan Rajas con Crema tacos, roasted poblano peppers sautéed with onion, garlic, and corn and bathed in an almond crema.

video.name: Vegan Rajas Con Crema
video.description: Vegan Rajas con Crema, roasted poblano pepper, onion corn and garlic in a non-dairy creamy sauce.

recipeIngredient: 5  Poblano peppers,roasted, peeled (seeded, cut into strips)
½ cup Vegetable stock or broth
¼ cup Almond milk, unsweetened or vegetable oil ((see note))

itemListElement.text: Heat a large sauté pan to medium heat, add water. Add the onion and sweat for 2-3 minutes or until it is tender and translucent.
itemListElement.name: Heat a large sauté pan to medium heat, add water. Add the onion and sweat for 2-3 minutes or until it is tender and translucent.

itemListElement.text: Add corn, garlic, and ½ cup of vegetable stock, cover and let steam until corn is tender, about 3 – 4 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Add corn, garlic, and ½ cup of vegetable stock, cover and let steam until corn is tender, about 3 – 4 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Add the poblano peppers and let cook for 1 minute more. Season with salt and pepper. Remove from the heat and let cool slightly.
itemListElement.name: Add the poblano peppers and let cook for 1 minute more. Season with salt and pepper. Remove from the heat and let cool slightly.

itemListElement.text: Place the almonds, garlic, water,almond milk, and lemon juice in the blender and process until smooth. Season with salt and pepper. Pour the almond crema over the cooled filling and mix well.
itemListElement.name: Place the almonds, garlic, water,almond milk, and lemon juice in the blender and process until smooth. Season with salt and pepper. Pour the almond crema over the cooled filling and mix well.

keywords: poblano peppers, rajas con crema, vegan tacos
